mapper.select: SELECT sno, uid, sano, sadate, stime, astate FROM servicea ORDER BY sno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO servicea(sno, uid, sano, sadate, stime, astate) VALUES(#{sno}, #{uid}, #{sano}, #{sadate}, #{stime}, #{astate})
mapper.update: UPDATE servicea SET sno = #{sno}, uid = #{uid}, sano = #{sano}, sadate = #{sadate}, stime = #{stime}, astate = #{astate}
